   /**
    * Tries to execute an RPC defined as a {@link RpcCallable}. Metrics will be recorded based on
    * the provided rpc name.

    * {@link #connect()} and the action will be re-executed.

+   * @param args the arguments for the description

+   * @throws AlluxioStatusException

timeline.bodyText: Why did we add synchronization here?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: originally to make findbug happy. after adding suppress, I could remove this keyword
replies.author: apc999

timeline.message: Enable client-side debug logging using Interface name rather than implementing class
